author: Dmitriy Chupyra
description: “The inspiration behind the cocktail is one man making the purest rum in the world. Just like a pearl that takes many years to form, it took Facundo Bacardí a long time to create a drink that is simple and clear, with a deep charisma.“The combination of tastes within my cocktail reflects the life journey of the Bacardí family: the sweetness of victories and bitterness of defeat, the salt of the moments and spice of the struggle.”
name: Family Pearl

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE allspice and pineapple in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, shake with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
